content: yo and draw up a loop *in the next st insert hook yo draw up a loop repeat from * once there should be 4 loops on hook yo pull through all 4 loops chain 1 a single_crochet cluster is made do the chain 1 to close each cluster a little loosely as it will make it easier for a stitch to go in there in the next round **insert hook into same st as the last st of the previous single_crochet cluster yo draw up a loop *in the next st insert hook yo draw up a loop repeat from * once there should be 4 loops on hook yo pull through all 4 loops chain 1 repeat from ** for every stitch around join with invj 34 sts and 17 single_crochet clusters rounds 5-7 repeat round 4 for a total of 5 row of single_crochet clusters round 8 chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st and in each st around 34 round 9 repeat round 2 round 10 refer again to the note and photo in round 3 regarding the back vertical bar in between the grouping stitches chain 1 working only in the back vertical bar single_crochet around join with invj 34 finishing cut yarn and finish off the tail use the yarn needle on the beginning tail to complete the initial seam at the beginning row weave in end and finish
